title: Hearts Of Sand
description: Trinity Pierce goes from mousy book worm to Vampire royalty. Hired by her creator to search for a very powerful vampiric artifact, she finds that she might actually be what everyone is after. She won't be without help, her personal assistant Arsen lends his hand in more than just her professional business and Vlad who funds her expedition hopes for more than just his artifact.A book full of excitement, romance, and a touch of humor. Follow Trinity as she goes on a wild goose chase to find a vampiric artifact that might be more Roma myth than archeological fact. But will it ever matter as much as the two men who are willing to help her?"Matters of the heart slip through our fingers quicker than sands in an hour glass"The first chapter can be found at the end of "The Guardian's Soul"
author: Jamie Lynn Dougherty
